product_name: realme Buds T310 Truly Wireless in-Ear Earbuds with 46dB Hybrid ANC, 360° Spatial Audio, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, Upto 40Hrs Battery and Fast Charging - (Black)

reviews.review: Realmente excelente. Esta marca nunca decepciona..

These are really, really Cheap quality Earbuds. Especially the realme Cheap Yellow Box that the Earbuds come in. Sound Quality is not worth listening to, just because of the poor build quality of the realme T310 Earbuds. The realme T310 Earbuds seem like they are only worth measly $12.00, just very poor quality overall.  Another Problem is that the realme APP does NOT work, or the App has a lot of Problems setting up the Earbuds. Logging into the realme account has a lot of constant Errors/Problems.  The realme Earbuds App does "NOT" work unless you sign into the realme account.  I had to return the realme T310 Earbuds for a Refund in after 1 day.  I would Not recommend the realme T310 Earbuds.
Once you start to turn up the volume to about half, you start to hear badly. They are somewhat comfortable, but their audio leaves a lot to be desired.
Muy buenos. Me encantan.

The realme Buds T310 deliver rich, balanced sound with punchy 12.4mm bass drivers and effective 46dB hybrid ANC. Boasting 40-hour playtime, fast charging, and customizable touch controls via the Realme Link App, they’re perfect for daily use. While spatial audio adds depth, it’s subtle. A budget-friendly powerhouse for music and commutes.

product_name: realme Buds Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, ANC to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3 - (Titanium Twilight)

reviews.review: Amazing sound. The app was wonky but I figured it out.

It seems like every pair of buds I purchased with the exception of some LG buds caused my ears to flare up and leak/ itch.  These give me zero issues and fit well.  They sound good too.  Only thing is I wish they had wireless charging case.
Los auriculares realmente son muy buenos lo que no me gustó fue la app para ajustarlos que por lo menos en iPhone no sirve porque no puedo entrar a ella
Para mi son audifonos que estan muy bien trabajados y con gran calidad de sonido.
Excelente producto.
Best earbuds in budget 🔥
Muy buen producto, excelente vendedor.

Out of the box, the sound is very good. But the app that is used by these ear buds does not work in the United States as of Sept. 2025. I have worked with the manufacturer for the last 3 weeks to try to fix this issue. The final solution from them (after many failed solutions) was to change the country code of both my mobile phone & tablet ("realme link" app did not work on either device).  After I tried this, I finally was able to log on to the app...only to have it repeatedly freeze.I have no other choice but to return it.

product_name: realme Air 7 True Wireless Earbuds, 52dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 52H Battery, Bluetooth 5.4, IP55 Water Resistance (Slate Gray)

reviews.review: Very good product
A little bit bassy, but very good overall.

ANC is good in these buds, uses them on a recent flight. Unobtrusive, battery gets 5+ hours of calls/music. Dropped case in sink full of water, just blew out the USB port and it still was working just fine.
Super lindos,  se justan genial, no pesan , sonido pro , excelente cancelación de sonido

product_name: Soundcore by Anker P20i True Wireless Earbuds, 10mm Drivers with Big Bass, Bluetooth 5.3, 30H Long Playtime, Water-Resistant, 2 Mics for AI Clear Calls, 22 Preset EQs, Customization (Blue)

reviews.review: This is my second pair of Sound Core earbuds. My first set lasted me for several years and I still use them, but thought I would have a second pair on hand just in case they fail. They have not failed yet. I love them! They are so comfortable to wear. They have great sound quality for the person on the other end of the phone as well as for me on my end of the phone. Pairing is a snap. I wear them when I am running and exercising. They stay in place, no problem. My last pair was white. This time I got the blue ones. The noise cancellation is awesome. But sometimes I just wear one earbud because I need to be aware of my surroundings while I’m listening to a podcast or a phone call.  You can charge the earbuds in the case without plugging it in if your case is charged up. The case charges and the earbuds charge. The charge lasts at least 8 hours or more and gives you a prompt when it’s running low. You can’t beat the price. They are the best earbuds I have ever had and I’ve tried all kinds, including much more expensive ones! (Up to $200). These are better quality sound, comfort and of course price than the super expensive ones. The case has a handy lanyard for easy grab/carry/ attach.

These earbuds sound excellent for their size and price. Bass is solid, and audio is clear for music, calls, and podcasts.They pair quickly and stay connected without issues. Battery life has been reliable, and the charging case is compact and easy to carry.Very impressed with the quality and performance.
Great fit, reliable.  Sound and bass is clear, charge is amazing lasts for hours .  Definitely quality for the price. Best deal for your buck.

Can really complain for the money. Decent product, dirt cheap, does the job. The sound quality is also surprisingly acceptable.I have not had these on long enough to test out battery life or what not. I use this for workouts, so no more than an hr or so of actual use a day.I hate the touch controls, so had to turn it off using the app. Thankfully they let you turn all of the touch controls via the app, plus turn off the noise\ping you hear when you brush up against the touch control....So this is as basic of use as you can get, which I look for in headphones.I am sick of haptic controls, touch controls, over-reliance of the accompanying app, and active noise cancelling features. All these stupid features are on all of the headphones now a days, and it annoys to no end.Especially ANC. I have them on my Momentum 4 headphones, and there is no real way to turn it off. You must install the Sennheiser app to enable transparency mode.... And even then its falsely off. I hate the feeling of ANC I hate how it works. Nobody likes it.I want a simple headphone I pop them in, they play audio. I put them back in the case, and they are off and charging.simple. stay out of my way with all of the extra garbage. Give me a headphone that does 1 thing, and make sure it has a hardware switch on it, and no press-to-hold power switch.The industry is bloated with trash so-called smart headphones. rant over.

I’ve had these earbuds for over a year now and I haven’t had any issues with them. They’ve never disconnected or connected unexpectedly. The battery life is also astonishing. They fit perfectly in my ears, and very comfortably. I love the color options they have available. You can customize your sound and the controls on their app. Only complaint is that they don’t have ANC, although in my experience my music already cancelled everything out.

These Soundcore earbuds are excellent, easy to use and sounds great.  And if I lose them, no big deal.  I have two sets of these now.  I also have four sets of Apple earbuds that are pretty much worthless.  Each set has one nonworking earbud and the other earbud doesn't keep a good charge.  Soundcore earbuds are comfortable as I wear them in bed listening to Audible.

Anker continues to surprise me with their quality/price ratio. My wife has a set of wireless earbuds from that “fruit” company and these blow those completely out of the water and for a fraction of the price.The are extremely clear and have great bass. The batteries on the earpieces and the case last longer than you’d think as well. The controls on the earpieces are very functional and I found them incredibly useful after I figured them out.Before you go out and spend big on earbuds, give these a try!

product_name: realme Buds Air 7 Pro with Ai Live Translation, 11mm+6mm Dual-dac Driver, 48 Hrs Playtime, 53 dB ANC, LHDC, 45Ms Low Latency, 360° Spatial Audio, IP55 Dust & Water Resistant, BT 5.4 - (Grey)

reviews.review: Muy buenos  buena calidad

I bought these earbuds primarily out of curiosity to see how the "AI live translation" feature worked. Overall, the earbuds themselves aren't bad, but the software that powers them leaves a lot to be desired.*The AI translation feature is present in a dedicated app menu, but the page or tab simply doesn't work at all after selecting the mode and languages.*The app itself demands many different permissions, including your location, microphone, and nearby devices. While microphone and nearby device access can somewhat be explained, sharing your location makes absolutely no sense, yet the app won't proceed without it. This prevents you from adjusting the sound mixer or even attempting to use the non-functional AI translation.*Noise cancellation works, but if there's any wind, you'll experience light clicking or crackling in your ear.*The earbuds come with additional eartip sizes. With the medium-sized tips, the earbuds shift around in my ears while walking, creating strange clicking noises. With the large tips, the earbuds simply fall out of my ears after 5-8 minutes of walking.For this price, not worth right now. In theory, for around $50-60, they'd be decent earbuds, as the material quality and sound are not bad at all.
Good headphones but the app sucks. I used 2 phones but it worked on neither of them. But the sound quality matches the price.
No cuenta con la traducción activa supuestamente tenia pero ahora dise que ya no esta disponible en EU

product_name: realme Buds Air 7 Pro with Ai Live Translation, 11mm+6mm Dual-dac Driver, 48 Hrs Playtime, 53 dB ANC, LHDC, 45Ms Low Latency, 360° Spatial Audio, IP55 Dust & Water Resistant, BT 5.4 - (Grey)

reviews.review: Muy buenos  buena calidad

I bought these earbuds primarily out of curiosity to see how the "AI live translation" feature worked. Overall, the earbuds themselves aren't bad, but the software that powers them leaves a lot to be desired.*The AI translation feature is present in a dedicated app menu, but the page or tab simply doesn't work at all after selecting the mode and languages.*The app itself demands many different permissions, including your location, microphone, and nearby devices. While microphone and nearby device access can somewhat be explained, sharing your location makes absolutely no sense, yet the app won't proceed without it. This prevents you from adjusting the sound mixer or even attempting to use the non-functional AI translation.*Noise cancellation works, but if there's any wind, you'll experience light clicking or crackling in your ear.*The earbuds come with additional eartip sizes. With the medium-sized tips, the earbuds shift around in my ears while walking, creating strange clicking noises. With the large tips, the earbuds simply fall out of my ears after 5-8 minutes of walking.For this price, not worth right now. In theory, for around $50-60, they'd be decent earbuds, as the material quality and sound are not bad at all.
Good headphones but the app sucks. I used 2 phones but it worked on neither of them. But the sound quality matches the price.

product_name: realme Earbud T300, Deep Bass, 30db ANC, Immersive Sound, Up to 40 Hour Playtime with Charging case, Bluetooth 5.3, Youth White

reviews.review: Muy buena compra,excelente sonido
Top

product_name: realme Buds T300 Truly Wireless in-Ear Earbuds with 30dB ANC, 360° Spatial Audio Effect, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Boost Driver with Dolby Atmos Support, Upto 40Hrs Battery and Fast Charging - (White)

reviews.review: Affordable with good sound quality. Durable and battery life has never been an issue. I would absolutely recommend these. The outside sound filtering isn’t the best but it does work. Bass levels aren’t the best but for earbuds at this price point I’d say it’s solid enough.

product_name: realme Buds Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, ANC to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3 - (Titanium Twilight)

reviews.review: Amazing sound. The app was wonky but I figured it out.

It seems like every pair of buds I purchased with the exception of some LG buds caused my ears to flare up and leak/ itch.  These give me zero issues and fit well.  They sound good too.  Only thing is I wish they had wireless charging case.
Los auriculares realmente son muy buenos lo que no me gustó fue la app para ajustarlos que por lo menos en iPhone no sirve porque no puedo entrar a ella
Para mi son audifonos que estan muy bien trabajados y con gran calidad de sonido.
Excelente producto.
Best earbuds in budget 🔥
Muy buen producto, excelente vendedor.

Out of the box, the sound is very good. But the app that is used by these ear buds does not work in the United States as of Sept. 2025. I have worked with the manufacturer for the last 3 weeks to try to fix this issue. The final solution from them (after many failed solutions) was to change the country code of both my mobile phone & tablet ("realme link" app did not work on either device).  After I tried this, I finally was able to log on to the app...only to have it repeatedly freeze.I have no other choice but to return it.

product_name: realme Buds Wireless 5 ANC in Ear Bluetooth Headphones, 50dB ANC, 13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 360° Spatial Audio, 45ms Low Latency, Upto 38hrs Playback, IP55 Rating, Dual Device Connection (Black)

reviews.review: Not 50db anc.  Has poor white noise filtering.  Just has a constant noise no matter what setting it's on.  Only lets you choose between "noise cancelling" and "transparent" mode, no option to just turn those modes off.  Otherwise they are fine.

product_name: realme Air 6 True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 40H Battery, Bluetooth 5.3, IP55 Water Resistance - (Green)

reviews.review: Very happy with my purchase. Great sound. Highly recommended.
They are very good and have excellent sound

La mejor compra que he podido hacer, llevo ya casi 2 años con ellos y siguen durando como el primer dia, las baterias le siguen durando casi 5 horas de reproducción activa a pesar de que ya tengo mas de 2k horas de uso en cada audifono, la cancelación de ruido es muy buena (Aunque en ambientes demasiado ruidosos tiene algunas fallas), la calidad de sonido es simplemente un 20/10 despues de tanto tiempo, los bajos son muy muy buenos y si los llevas al maximo no decepcionan, tienen una fuerza y golpe increible, los medios y altos no se quedan atras, son de lo mejor y nunca se me ha caido incluso haciendo ejercicio

The battery life is honestly amazing!Sounds quality truly good.My only complaint is there is no equalizer option for iPhones so you can’t customize anything.I also dislike that if you just put 1 earphone in then it starts off with transparency mode and you must switch it to normal. There is no option to turn off this “feature” so they will always start off as transparent first, and that’s for all products regardless if you have android or anything else.Overall great but gets annoying if you take your headphone on and off a lot.
Excelente
Buen material, buen sonido, buena calidad.
funcionan bien, y la cancelacion de ruido se nota mucho

I had previously bought the realme 5 pro and they were great. With these realme 6 I can't say the same. It has problems with the microphone and they disconnect every moment. I can't use it on calls. Unfortunately, the 30 days of return from Amazon had already elapsed. Which they sent me to request a guarantee with realme but they don't give you any help.

product_name: Soundcore by Anker P20i True Wireless Earbuds, 10mm Drivers with Big Bass, Bluetooth 5.3, 30H Long Playtime, Water-Resistant, 2 Mics for AI Clear Calls, 22 Preset EQs, Customization via App

reviews.review: This is my second pair of Sound Core earbuds. My first set lasted me for several years and I still use them, but thought I would have a second pair on hand just in case they fail. They have not failed yet. I love them! They are so comfortable to wear. They have great sound quality for the person on the other end of the phone as well as for me on my end of the phone. Pairing is a snap. I wear them when I am running and exercising. They stay in place, no problem. My last pair was white. This time I got the blue ones. The noise cancellation is awesome. But sometimes I just wear one earbud because I need to be aware of my surroundings while I’m listening to a podcast or a phone call.  You can charge the earbuds in the case without plugging it in if your case is charged up. The case charges and the earbuds charge. The charge lasts at least 8 hours or more and gives you a prompt when it’s running low. You can’t beat the price. They are the best earbuds I have ever had and I’ve tried all kinds, including much more expensive ones! (Up to $200). These are better quality sound, comfort and of course price than the super expensive ones. The case has a handy lanyard for easy grab/carry/ attach.

These earbuds sound excellent for their size and price. Bass is solid, and audio is clear for music, calls, and podcasts.They pair quickly and stay connected without issues. Battery life has been reliable, and the charging case is compact and easy to carry.Very impressed with the quality and performance.
Great fit, reliable.  Sound and bass is clear, charge is amazing lasts for hours .  Definitely quality for the price. Best deal for your buck.

Can really complain for the money. Decent product, dirt cheap, does the job. The sound quality is also surprisingly acceptable.I have not had these on long enough to test out battery life or what not. I use this for workouts, so no more than an hr or so of actual use a day.I hate the touch controls, so had to turn it off using the app. Thankfully they let you turn all of the touch controls via the app, plus turn off the noise\ping you hear when you brush up against the touch control....So this is as basic of use as you can get, which I look for in headphones.I am sick of haptic controls, touch controls, over-reliance of the accompanying app, and active noise cancelling features. All these stupid features are on all of the headphones now a days, and it annoys to no end.Especially ANC. I have them on my Momentum 4 headphones, and there is no real way to turn it off. You must install the Sennheiser app to enable transparency mode.... And even then its falsely off. I hate the feeling of ANC I hate how it works. Nobody likes it.I want a simple headphone I pop them in, they play audio. I put them back in the case, and they are off and charging.simple. stay out of my way with all of the extra garbage. Give me a headphone that does 1 thing, and make sure it has a hardware switch on it, and no press-to-hold power switch.The industry is bloated with trash so-called smart headphones. rant over.

I’ve had these earbuds for over a year now and I haven’t had any issues with them. They’ve never disconnected or connected unexpectedly. The battery life is also astonishing. They fit perfectly in my ears, and very comfortably. I love the color options they have available. You can customize your sound and the controls on their app. Only complaint is that they don’t have ANC, although in my experience my music already cancelled everything out.

These Soundcore earbuds are excellent, easy to use and sounds great.  And if I lose them, no big deal.  I have two sets of these now.  I also have four sets of Apple earbuds that are pretty much worthless.  Each set has one nonworking earbud and the other earbud doesn't keep a good charge.  Soundcore earbuds are comfortable as I wear them in bed listening to Audible.

Anker continues to surprise me with their quality/price ratio. My wife has a set of wireless earbuds from that “fruit” company and these blow those completely out of the water and for a fraction of the price.The are extremely clear and have great bass. The batteries on the earpieces and the case last longer than you’d think as well. The controls on the earpieces are very functional and I found them incredibly useful after I figured them out.Before you go out and spend big on earbuds, give these a try!

product_name: realme Air 7 True Wireless Earbuds, 52dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 52H Battery, Bluetooth 5.4, IP55 Water Resistance (Slate Gray)

reviews.review: Very good product
A little bit bassy, but very good overall.

ANC is good in these buds, uses them on a recent flight. Unobtrusive, battery gets 5+ hours of calls/music. Dropped case in sink full of water, just blew out the USB port and it still was working just fine.
Super lindos,  se justan genial, no pesan , sonido pro , excelente cancelación de sonido

product_name: Realme Air 7 True Wireless Earbuds, 52dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 52H Battery, Bluetooth 5.4, IP55 Water Resistance (Ivory Gold)

A little bit bassy, but very good overall.

ANC is good in these buds, uses them on a recent flight. Unobtrusive, battery gets 5+ hours of calls/music. Dropped case in sink full of water, just blew out the USB port and it still was working just fine.

product_name: realme Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, Adaptive Noise Cancelling to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3, Grey

reviews.review: ConThe only bad part about these earbuds is the realme link app. It is not that great. One MUST create an account to use the app. Then, every time you open the app, asks you to sign in, but if you click on cancel, you are already signed in. This is just not acceptable.ProsThe earbuds have a feature called 360 spatial audio. What a difference this feature makes! The sound goes from an above average sound experience to an outstanding experience. I have to say, these are the best earbuds for the price that I have ever owned.I highly recommend these earbuds.
I’ve purchased these twice now (because I lost them the first time!) such a great value for money, fit well in my ears and never hurt. Solid feeling, not too heavy. And perfect sound quality to boot.

Easy setup, appealing case but most of all, super sound, great Eq and superior noise cancellation for immersive sound.I have migrated from Samsung Buds ( I lost my case and you simply cant get a replacement which does pairing) and I can say that the sound on these is much better and ear fit is more comfortable.

Great sound quality, great noise cancelling (can be turned off), good battery life. The magnets that hold the case closed are awful and the app isn't well supported for Android but it does have an interesting sound profile mode that improves the audio balancing—great for those who have worked too long around loud noises. The case is a bit "slippery" which can be annoying and the buds themselves can be fatiguing after a while. I wouldn't mind a more covert shape and color...
Excelente calidad de audio. Y eso que soy exigente con eso !
Estos audífonos son lo máximo los recomiendo 100%
El audífono izquierdo no encendía vino defectuoso de fábrica y para la devolución me cobraban $145.00 por el envío, desde Ecuador hacia Usa, me toco llevarlo a reparar.
Nice sound quality, worked with global Realme app. The case does scratch easily, though so i got a cover.

product_name: realme Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, Adaptive Noise Cancelling to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3, Grey

very good quality and features for the price

reviews.review: ConThe only bad part about these earbuds is the realme link app. It is not that great. One MUST create an account to use the app. Then, every time you open the app, asks you to sign in, but if you click on cancel, you are already signed in. This is just not acceptable.ProsThe earbuds have a feature called 360 spatial audio. What a difference this feature makes! The sound goes from an above average sound experience to an outstanding experience. I have to say, these are the best earbuds for the price that I have ever owned.I highly recommend these earbuds.
I’ve purchased these twice now (because I lost them the first time!) such a great value for money, fit well in my ears and never hurt. Solid feeling, not too heavy. And perfect sound quality to boot.

Easy setup, appealing case but most of all, super sound, great Eq and superior noise cancellation for immersive sound.I have migrated from Samsung Buds ( I lost my case and you simply cant get a replacement which does pairing) and I can say that the sound on these is much better and ear fit is more comfortable.

Great sound quality, great noise cancelling (can be turned off), good battery life. The magnets that hold the case closed are awful and the app isn't well supported for Android but it does have an interesting sound profile mode that improves the audio balancing—great for those who have worked too long around loud noises. The case is a bit "slippery" which can be annoying and the buds themselves can be fatiguing after a while. I wouldn't mind a more covert shape and color...
Excelente calidad de audio. Y eso que soy exigente con eso !
Estos audífonos son lo máximo los recomiendo 100%
El audífono izquierdo no encendía vino defectuoso de fábrica y para la devolución me cobraban $145.00 por el envío, desde Ecuador hacia Usa, me toco llevarlo a reparar.
Nice sound quality, worked with global Realme app. The case does scratch easily, though so i got a cover.

product_name: realme Buds Wireless 5 ANC in Ear Bluetooth Headphones, 50dB ANC, 13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 360° Spatial Audio, 45ms Low Latency, Upto 38hrs Playback, IP55 Rating, Dual Device Connection (Silver)

reviews.review: Not 50db anc.  Has poor white noise filtering.  Just has a constant noise no matter what setting it's on.  Only lets you choose between "noise cancelling" and "transparent" mode, no option to just turn those modes off.  Otherwise they are fine.

product_name: realme Buds Wireless 5 ANC in Ear Bluetooth Headphones, 50dB ANC, 13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 360° Spatial Audio, 45ms Low Latency, Upto 38hrs Playback, IP55 Rating, Dual Device Connection (Silver)

reviews.review: Not 50db anc.  Has poor white noise filtering.  Just has a constant noise no matter what setting it's on.  Only lets you choose between "noise cancelling" and "transparent" mode, no option to just turn those modes off.  Otherwise they are fine.

product_name: realme Air 6 True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 40H Battery, Bluetooth 5.3, IP55 Water Resistance, Flame Silver

reviews.review: Llegaron dos días antes, suenan increíble y la carga le dura al rededor de 3 horas con la canselacion de ruido y el sonido al máximo pero sin la canselacion y a un 70 del volumen si llegan a 6 horas

product_name: realme Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, Adaptive Noise Cancelling to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3, Grey

The magnets that hold the case closed are awful and the app isn't well supported for Android but it does have an interesting sound profile mode that improves the audio balancing—great for those who have worked too long around loud noises. The case is a bit "slippery" which can be annoying and the buds themselves can be fatiguing after a while. I wouldn't mind a more covert shape and color...

product_name: realme Buds Air 6 Pro True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Noise Reduction, ANC to Ears and Environment, Hi-Res Sound, LDAC, 3D Audio, 40H Battery, Wireless Charging, Bluetooth 5.3 - (Silver Blue)

reviews.review: Amazing sound. The app was wonky but I figured it out.

It seems like every pair of buds I purchased with the exception of some LG buds caused my ears to flare up and leak/ itch.  These give me zero issues and fit well.  They sound good too.  Only thing is I wish they had wireless charging case.
Los auriculares realmente son muy buenos lo que no me gustó fue la app para ajustarlos que por lo menos en iPhone no sirve porque no puedo entrar a ella
Para mi son audifonos que estan muy bien trabajados y con gran calidad de sonido.
Excelente producto.
Best earbuds in budget 🔥
Muy buen producto, excelente vendedor.

Out of the box, the sound is very good. But the app that is used by these ear buds does not work in the United States as of Sept. 2025. I have worked with the manufacturer for the last 3 weeks to try to fix this issue. The final solution from them (after many failed solutions) was to change the country code of both my mobile phone & tablet ("realme link" app did not work on either device).  After I tried this, I finally was able to log on to the app...only to have it repeatedly freeze.I have no other choice but to return it.

product_name: realme Air 6 True Wireless Earbuds, 50dB Active Noise Reduction, Hi-Res Sound, LHDC, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, 6 Mics Clear Call, 40H Battery, Bluetooth 5.3, IP55 Water Resistance - (Green)

reviews.review: Very happy with my purchase. Great sound. Highly recommended.
They are very good and have excellent sound

La mejor compra que he podido hacer, llevo ya casi 2 años con ellos y siguen durando como el primer dia, las baterias le siguen durando casi 5 horas de reproducción activa a pesar de que ya tengo mas de 2k horas de uso en cada audifono, la cancelación de ruido es muy buena (Aunque en ambientes demasiado ruidosos tiene algunas fallas), la calidad de sonido es simplemente un 20/10 despues de tanto tiempo, los bajos son muy muy buenos y si los llevas al maximo no decepcionan, tienen una fuerza y golpe increible, los medios y altos no se quedan atras, son de lo mejor y nunca se me ha caido incluso haciendo ejercicio

The battery life is honestly amazing!Sounds quality truly good.My only complaint is there is no equalizer option for iPhones so you can’t customize anything.I also dislike that if you just put 1 earphone in then it starts off with transparency mode and you must switch it to normal. There is no option to turn off this “feature” so they will always start off as transparent first, and that’s for all products regardless if you have android or anything else.Overall great but gets annoying if you take your headphone on and off a lot.
Excelente
Buen material, buen sonido, buena calidad.
funcionan bien, y la cancelacion de ruido se nota mucho

I had previously bought the realme 5 pro and they were great. With these realme 6 I can't say the same. It has problems with the microphone and they disconnect every moment. I can't use it on calls. Unfortunately, the 30 days of return from Amazon had already elapsed. Which they sent me to request a guarantee with realme but they don't give you any help.
